text: Jacques Pennewaert (11 March 1940 – 16 July 2016) was a Belgian runner. He competed in the 400 m and 800 m events at the 1964 and 1968 Olympics with the best result of eighth place in the 800 m in 1964. ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Belgian male middle-distance runners Category:Belgian male sprinters Category:Olympic athletes of Belgium Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1968 Summer Olympics Category:Universiade medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Sportspeople from Brussels Category:Universiade silver medalists for Belgium Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Belgium Category:Medalists at the 1961 Summer Universiade Category:Medalists at the 1963 Summer Universiade
title: Jacques Pennewaert
